privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for portfolio website and contact services.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.content: We ("we", "us", "our") value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit my portfolio website and interact with our services.

personal.heading: Personal Information
personal.content: When you contact us through our contact form or other communication methods, we may collect your email address, phone number (optional), and your project idea or inquiry description.

automatic.heading: Automatically Collected Data
automatic.content: We may also collect your IP address and technical data to help secure and maintain the website.

howWeUse.heading: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Respond to your inquiries and provide the requested information or services
Communicate with you regarding your requests
Maintain and improve our website security and functionality

legalBases.heading: Legal Bases for Processing (EU GDPR)
legalBases.intro: If you are located in the European Economic Area (EEA), our legal basis for collecting and using your personal information depends on the information concerned and the specific context, including:
items: Our legitimate interests, such as responding to inquiries and maintaining site security

dataSharing.heading: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or lease your personal information to third parties. We may share your data only with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and services (such as email providers). These providers are obligated to keep your information confidential.

dataSecurity.heading: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement reasonable administrative, technical, and physical measures designed to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is completely secure.

yourRights.heading: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal data:
items: Access to the data we hold about you
Erasure of your personal data (right to be forgotten)
Restriction or objection to our processing of your data
Withdrawal of consent at any time (where processing is based on consent)
yourRights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at the details below.

retention.heading: Retention of Data
retention.content: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy or comply with legal requirements.

cookies.heading: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We do not currently use cookies or tracking technologies to collect personal information beyond what is necessary for the functionality and security of the website.

internationalTransfers.heading: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.content: As our clients are located worldwide, including Europe, Poland, and the United States, your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in those transfers.

childrenPrivacy.heading: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal data from children under 13.

changes.heading: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.text: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or your personal data, you may contact us by email:
